<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// StackFrameLayoutAnalysisPass implementation. Outputs information about the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// layout of the stack frame, using the remarks interface. On the CLI it prints</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a textual representation of the stack frame. When possible it prints the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values that occupy a stack slot using any available debug information. Since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// output is remarks based, it is also available in a machine readable file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// format, such as YAML.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-stackframelayoutanalysispass-cpp-/stackframelayoutanalysispass/#a2cea2a552183ce91c9617c732d395ee0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-stackframelayoutanalysispass-cpp-/stackframelayoutanalysispass/#a2cea2a552183ce91c9617c732d395ee0">emitStackSlotRemark</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-stackframelayoutanalysispass-cpp-/stackframelayoutanalysispass/slotdata">SlotData</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoptimizationremarkanalysis">MachineOptimizationRemarkAnalysis</a> &amp;Rem) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To make it easy to understand the stack layout from the CLI, we want to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// print each slot like the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Offset: &#91;SP+8&#93;, Type: Spill, Align: 8, Size: 16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       foo @ /path/to/file.c:25</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       bar @ /path/to/file.c:35</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Which prints the size, alignment, and offset from the SP at function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But we also want the machine readable remarks data to be nicely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// organized. So we print some additional data as strings for the CLI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// output, but maintain more structured data for the YAML.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example we store the Offset in YAML as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    - Offset: -8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    - ScalableOffset: -16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: the ScalableOffset entries are added only for slots with non-zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scalable offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But we print it to the CLI as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Offset: &#91;SP-8&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Or with non-zero scalable offset:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Offset: &#91;SP-8-16 x vscale&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Negative offsets will print a leading &#96;-&#96;, so only add &#96;+&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::string Prefix =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a653cce37b80c03eebe7a00520a8eabb6">formatv</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\nOffset: &#91;SP&#123;0&#125;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>.Offset.getFixed() &lt; 0) ? </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;+&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">).str();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Rem &lt;&lt; Prefix &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ore/#a5ca06dfbc998afac005414d8e9b7c234">ore::NV</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Offset&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>.Offset.getFixed());</span></CodeLine>
